languages.text: "Если мы сойдем с курса, то навсегда затеряемся в варпе. Конечно, долго мы с вами при этом не проживем, но даже при таком условии соглашаться на подобный исход я пока не намерен".

traits.locale_text: "Если мы сойдем с курса, то навсегда затеряемся в варпе. Конечно, долго мы с вами при этом не проживем, но даже при таком условии соглашаться на подобный исход я пока не намерен".

languages.text: "If we get thrown off course, we will be forever lost in the warp. Naturally, we would likely not have long to live in that scenario, but I will not resign myself to such an outcome just yet."
languages.original_text: "Если мы сойдем с курса, то навсегда затеряемся в варпе. Конечно, долго мы с вами при этом не проживем, но даже при таком условии соглашаться на подобный исход я пока не намерен".

traits.locale_text: "If we get thrown off course, we will be forever lost in the warp. Naturally, we will not have long to live in that scenario, but even so, I do not intend to agree to such an outcome just yet."
"If we get thrown off course, we will be forever lost in the warp. Naturally, we will not have long to live in that scenario, but even so, I do not intend to agree to such an outcome just yet."

"If we get thrown off course, we will be forever lost in the warp. Naturally, we will not have long to live in that scenario, but even so, I do not intend to resign myself to such an outcome just yet."

"If we get thrown off course, we will be forever lost in the warp. Naturally, we will not have long to live in that scenario, but even so, I do not intend to resign myself to such an outcome just yet."
"If we get thrown off course, we will be forever lost in the warp. Naturally, we would likely not have long to live in that scenario, but I will not resign myself to such an outcome just yet."

languages.text: “如果我们被甩出了航线，就会永远被困在亚空间之中。当然，如果真的发生了这种情况，我们用不了多久就会没命，但无论怎样，我不打算现在就认命。”
languages.original_text: "If we get thrown off course, we will be forever lost in the warp. Naturally, we would likely not have long to live in that scenario, but I will not resign myself to such an outcome just yet."

traits.locale_text: “如果我们被甩出了航线，就会永远被困在亚空间之中。当然，如果真的发生了这种情况，我们用不了多久就会没命。但即便如此，我也不打算现在就认命。”

languages.text: «Si nos desviamos de la ruta, nos perderemos para siempre en la disformidad. Naturalmente, en ese caso no duraremos mucho, pero, en cualquier caso, aún no estoy dispuesto a resignarme a ese destino».
languages.original_text: "If we get thrown off course, we will be forever lost in the warp. Naturally, we would likely not have long to live in that scenario, but I will not resign myself to such an outcome just yet."

traits.locale_text: «Si nos desviamos de la ruta, nos perderemos para siempre en la disformidad. Naturalmente, no sobreviviremos durante mucho tiempo en ese escenario, pero, en cualquier caso, aún no estoy dispuesto a resignarme a ese destino».

languages.text: 「もし我々が航路を外れて投げ出されたら、<歪み>の中を永遠にさまようことになるでしょう。当然、そんな状況では長く生きられないでしょうが、今はまだそんな結末を受け入れるつもりはありません」
languages.original_text: "If we get thrown off course, we will be forever lost in the warp. Naturally, we would likely not have long to live in that scenario, but I will not resign myself to such an outcome just yet."

traits.locale_text: 「もし我々がコースを外れて投げ出されたら、〈歪み〉の中を永遠にさまようことになるでしょう。そうなったら長生きしないことも自然な流れですが、その場合でも私は負けて死ぬつもりはありません」
「もし我々が航路を外れて投げ出されたら、<歪み>の中を永遠にさまようことになるでしょう。当然、そんな状況では長く生きられないでしょうが、今はまだそんな結末を受け入れるつもりはありません」

languages.text: « Si nous perdons notre cap, nous serons condamnés à errer à jamais dans le Warp. Bien sûr, nous ne survivrons probablement pas bien longtemps dans de telles conditions, mais je n'ai pas l'intention de me résigner à un tel sort. »
languages.original_text: "If we get thrown off course, we will be forever lost in the warp. Naturally, we would likely not have long to live in that scenario, but I will not resign myself to such an outcome just yet."

traits.locale_text: « Si nous perdons notre cap, nous serons condamnés à errer à jamais dans le Warp. Bien sûr, nous ne survivrons pas très longtemps dans cette situation, mais quand bien même, je n'ai pas l'intention de me résigner à un tel sort. »

languages.text: "Wenn wir vom Kurs abkommen, sind wir für immer im Warp verloren. Natürlich hätten wir in diesem Szenario nicht mehr lange zu leben, aber dieses Ergebnis möchte ich derzeit noch nicht in Erwägung ziehen."
languages.original_text: "If we get thrown off course, we will be forever lost in the warp. Naturally, we would likely not have long to live in that scenario, but I will not resign myself to such an outcome just yet."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn wir vom Kurs abkommen, sind wir für immer im Warp verloren. Natürlich hätten wir in dem Fall nicht mehr lange zu leben, aber dennoch will ich dieses Ergebnis im Moment noch nicht in Erwägung ziehen."

languages.original_text: "If we get thrown off course, we will be forever lost in the warp. Naturally, we would likely not have long to live in that scenario, but I will not resign myself to such an outcome just yet."

languages.text: "Rotamızdan çıkartılırsak sonsuza dek öteboyutta kayboluruz. Bu tarz bir senaryoda çok yaşamayız elbette ancak böyle bir akıbete boyun eğmeye henüz niyetim yok."
languages.original_text: "If we get thrown off course, we will be forever lost in the warp. Naturally, we would likely not have long to live in that scenario, but I will not resign myself to such an outcome just yet."

traits.locale_text: "Rotamızdan çıkartılırsak sonsuza dek öteboyutta kayboluruz. Bu tarz bir senaryoda çok yaşamayız elbette ancak böyle bir akıbete boyun eğmeye henüz niyetim yok."
